text: Boht buri hai woh cheez jiss kay badlay enhon ney apney aap ko baich dala woh inn kay kufur kerna hai. Allah Taalaa ki taraf say nazil shuda cheez kay sath mehaz iss baat say jal ker kay Allah Taalaa ney apna fazal apney jiss banday per chaha nazil farmaya iss kay baees ye log ghazab per ghazab kay mustahiq hogaye aur inn kafiron kay liye ruswa kerney wala azab hai
